scripts.postbuild: copyfiles schematics/**/schema.json schematics/*/files/** schematics/*/files-optional/** schematics/collection.json ../../dist/isha-apac/ && copyfiles -u 2 ../../.vscode/**/* ../../dist/isha-apac/schematics/ide-setup/files && copyfiles -u 2 ../../.prettierrc ../../dist/isha-apac/schematics/ide-setup/files
scripts.publish: npm run clean && ng build isha-apac && npm run build && cd ../../dist/isha-apac && npm pack && npm publish
